Official Word From Tecmo Japan On God's Slate
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Items: Official Word From Tecmo Japan On God's Slate
By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, October 10, 2001 - 08:55 pm:

Got this in my email today, hope you enjoy it!

Here's the official reply from Japan:


"The player goes on a journey with an archaeologist. In the midst of their
journey they discover a stone called the God Slate (the item). The God Slate
is a very rare and famous stone among archaeologists, so the archaeologist
travelling with the player jumps with joy and says "Wow ! I found it! This
is one hell of a stone and I'm the one who found it !" The archaeologist
goes nuts over a piece of stone...


That's it. What? You expected more? I did too. But that's all and the fact
is the God Slate is simply an item you obtain along the road in MR2 and it
has no power whatsoever to unlock anything. It's simply a stone that an
archaeologist in MR2 admires and would die for. "
